name: Pixel Platformer (subkash_2206)
description:
Use right arrow key to move right

Use left arrow key to move left

Use up arrow key to move up

This is a game i made around 2-3 years ago. As the name suggests, this is a short platformer game that i made in around 2 days.  If you like it be sure to support me by donating. I am open to any suggestions and i hope you enjoy the game.
